txt.en:
'My son told me that the ruins are full of treasure! Lost relics of kings and queens who did battle here and fell, spewing curses so potent that none dared to strip them of their goods. They just left them where they fell, and let the birds and wolves see to the bodies.'

Garan shudders.

'I do not believe in curses, but I think we shall continue on our way regardless.'
Ghostly Roads
The path is in the south-western Angle.\n\nThe brigand was guarding a small path. You should investigate the path.
Defeat the relic hunter captain
Defeat relic snatchers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'You return! Is the ghost defeated?'

You tell him about the relic hunters.

'So the cur was trying to scare people away from where they were digging by pretending to be a ghost? Well, he certainly fooled me!

'You have my thanks, friend! I would have seen to it myself were I a few decades younger. We are grateful to you! We havenâ€™t much, but please, take this for your trouble. We will be on our way to Tornhad once more, all thanks to you!'
Relic hunters and relic snatchers can be found in the south-western Angle.\n\nYou should defeat relic hunters and snatchers.

'Well, look here! My very favourite [placeholder]! Your timing is most fortuitous once again. Another one of those wretched spirits is pestering good folks like ourselves. I stepped off of the road for barely an instant and it swept towards me most frightfully!\n\n'I was just regrouping and getting prepared to send it packing, but now that you are here... well, youth before beauty. We would be much obliged if you could see to its defeat.'
Defeat relic hunters ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Look for the ghostly figure
Waltney and Garan Maythorn are in the south-western Angle.\n\nYou should let Waltney and Garan know that the brigand pretending to be a ghost has been defeated.
A path leads deeper into the rocks!
Examine the disturbed ground
A tin of chalky-white paint! Good for pretending to be a ghost
Waltney and Garan Maythorn's progress is halted once more by a ghost-like spectre.

The outcrop is in the south-western Angle.\n\nYou have defeated a man who was masquerading as a ghost, and found a bag with a tin of white paint. Continue searching the rocky outcrop for clues as to why he was trying to scare people away from this area.

The outcrop is in the south-western Angle.\n\nYou have defeated a Man who was masquerading as a ghost. Search the area of the rocky outcrop he was lurking around for clues as to why he was trying to scare people away from this area.
A tin of chalky-white paint! Good for pretending to be a ghost
A Man pretending to be a ghost? What was he hiding?
The Ghostly Roads Go Ever On
The ghostly figure can be found near the road south of Eitheldir in the western Angle.\n\nYou should look for the ghostly figure.
Search the rocky outcrop
Return to the elderly couple
The dirt pile is near the road south of Eitheldir.\n\nYou should investigate the pile of dirt.
Thieves and grave-robbers!
Continue searching for clues
Defeated relic snatchers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'My son said that ruins in the Angle are full of treasure! Cursed treasure, he said! I do not believe in curses!'

He jumps as his horse stamps its foot. Clearing his throat, he goes on, frowning at Garan who is doubled over laughing.

'However, we shall wait here until we have word from you that the road is clear.'

The ground has been disturbed here
Follow the path
